column1: my new   civic. haha! smile more buddy! all the love to you and your family will there be any new starheads from united in fifa 14? we love you pauly! california man is the greatest movie ever! weez some juu-uuzz!! d!! just took a cigarette break from heavy rain. i had to, this scary doctor just tried to go human centipede on my ass! he looks just like john guidetti!! merry xmas!!! i love that america is now on the swedish fika-train! #swedishpower rt mid afternoon coffee fix with the girls #fika amazing pic, amazing guy, amazing band! just saw your sister's sister and safety not guaranteed, and i gotta say that you blew me away. not in a gay way though. today is my birthday, and it's 24 years on the day that had my first cunt experience! thank you!!!!!! looks awesome man!! rt sometimes i'll write myself an email on my ipad, send it to my laptop where i'll forward it as text to my iphone. was gonna travel to manchester today from stockholm but instead i'm in bed with a fever. so you'll have to win without me! haha you've earned to rest! great job today!! good luck and bring us 3 points!!!!! rt have a great weekend and don't forget to watch the game. a signed shirt from the new scholes would be the best thing since i lost my virginity!! ;) caught a glimps of a frame behind clay that said "stockholm sweden" in the last episode. is there a chapter in stockholm? rt
